source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video opens with a low-angle, extreme wide shot of an urban alley, with a concrete curb in the immediate foreground. A skateboarder is initially positioned in the left middle ground, next to a large green dumpster. A black car is parked in the left foreground, while a white car is visible further back in the center background. As the skateboarder moves from the left toward the camera, the shot size dynamically increases to a full shot. He then jumps over the foreground curb, moving into the top center of the frame, which briefly becomes a medium shot as his lower body exits the view. After landing in the right middle ground, he skates away from the camera along the right side of the alley, causing the shot to transition back to an extreme wide shot as he becomes a small figure in the right background.
